title: Tales of Vesperia
description: Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting â€œSee Game Manual".   "Tales of Vesperia" is the latest installment in the worldwide multi-million selling Tales RPG series. Experience sharp, beautiful graphics in HD, captivating voiced events and real-time, action-packed battles featuring all new enhanced systems such as "Fatal Strikes" and "Burst Artes."
